definition: requiring or amenable to treatment by medicine especially as opposed to surgery, a thorough physical examination
details:
adjective
- requiring or amenable to treatment by medicine especially as opposed to surgery
= example: requiring or amenable to treatment by medicine especially as opposed to surgery
- of or belonging to Aesculapius or the healing art
= synonyms: aesculapian
- relating to the study or practice of medicine
= example: relating to the study or practice of medicine
noun
- a thorough physical examination
= synonyms: checkup
